CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Porter, Mike"),"MPorter@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Montagne, Sarah"),"smontagne@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Ward, Nick"),"NWard@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Wright, Chris"),"cwright@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Da silva, Camille"),"cdasilva@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Ferraro, Antonio"),"aferraro@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Kelly, Alexa"),"alexak@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Medus, Heather"),"hmedus@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Wainman, Ana"),"awainman@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Project_Manager__c) == "Samuel, Mike"),"RSamuel@ges.com", ""))))))))))
CustomField.label: GES Project Manager Email Formula
